mn148:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn148:2.1: “dhammam vo, bhikkhave, desessami adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakasessami, yadidam—
mn148:2.3: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn148:2.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
mn148:3.1: “Cha ajjhattikani ayatanani veditabbani, cha bahirani ayatanani veditabbani, cha vinnanakaya veditabba, cha phassakaya veditabba, cha vedanakaya veditabba, cha tanhakaya veditabba.
mn148:4.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn148:4.3: Cakkhayatanam, sotayatanam, ghanayatanam, jivhayatanam, kayayatanam, manayatanam.
mn148:4.5: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn148:5.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn148:5.3: Rupayatanam, saddayatanam, gandhayatanam, rasayatanam, photthabbayatanam, dhammayatanam.
mn148:5.5: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn148:6.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn148:6.3: Cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam,
mn148:6.4: sotanca paticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavinnanam,
mn148:6.5: ghananca paticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghanavinnanam,
mn148:6.6: jivhanca paticca rase ca uppajjati jivhavinnanam,
mn148:6.7: kayanca paticca photthabbe ca uppajjati kayavinnanam,
mn148:6.8: mananca paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam.
mn148:6.10: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn148:7.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn148:7.3: Cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso;
mn148:7.4: sotanca paticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso;
mn148:7.5: ghananca paticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghanavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso;
mn148:7.6: jivhanca paticca rase ca uppajjati jivhavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso;
mn148:7.7: kayanca paticca photthabbe ca uppajjati kayavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso;
mn148:7.8: mananca paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso.
mn148:7.10: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn148:8.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn148:8.3: Cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana;
mn148:8.4: sotanca paticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana;
mn148:8.5: ghananca paticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghanavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana;
mn148:8.6: jivhanca paticca rase ca uppajjati jivhavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana;
mn148:8.7: kayanca paticca photthabbe ca uppajjati kayavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana;
mn148:8.8: mananca paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana.
mn148:8.10: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn148:9.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn148:9.3: Cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana, vedanapaccaya tanha;
mn148:9.4: sotanca paticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavinnanam …pe…
mn148:9.5: ghananca paticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghanavinnanam …
mn148:9.6: jivhanca paticca rase ca uppajjati jivhavinnanam …
mn148:9.7: kayanca paticca photthabbe ca uppajjati kayavinnanam …
mn148:9.8: mananca paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana, vedanapaccaya tanha.
mn148:9.10: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
mn148:10.1: ‘Cakkhu atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:10.3: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:10.7: ‘Rupa atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:10.9: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:10.13: ‘Cakkhuvinnanam atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:10.15: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:10.18: Iti cakkhu anatta, rupa anatta, cakkhuvinnanam anatta.
mn148:10.19: ‘Cakkhusamphasso atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:10.21: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:10.24: Iti cakkhu anatta, rupa anatta, cakkhuvinnanam anatta, cakkhusamphasso anatta.
mn148:10.25: ‘Vedana atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:10.27: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:10.30: Iti cakkhu anatta, rupa anatta, cakkhuvinnanam anatta, cakkhusamphasso anatta, vedana anatta.
mn148:10.31: ‘Tanha atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:10.33: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:10.36: Iti cakkhu anatta, rupa anatta, cakkhuvinnanam anatta, cakkhusamphasso anatta, vedana anatta, tanha anatta.
mn148:11.5: ‘mano atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:11.7: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:12.1: ‘Dhamma atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:12.3: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:13.1: ‘Manovinnanam atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:13.3: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:13.6: Iti mano anatta, dhamma anatta, manovinnanam anatta.
mn148:14.1: ‘Manosamphasso atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:14.3: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:14.6: Iti mano anatta, dhamma anatta, manovinnanam anatta, manosamphasso anatta.
mn148:15.1: ‘Vedana atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:15.3: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:15.6: Iti mano anatta, dhamma anatta, manovinnanam anatta, manosamphasso anatta, vedana anatta.
mn148:15.7: ‘Tanha atta’ti yo vadeyya tam na upapajjati.
mn148:15.9: Yassa kho pana uppadopi vayopi pannayati, ‘atta me uppajjati ca veti ca’ti iccassa evamagatam hoti.
mn148:15.12: Iti mano anatta, dhamma anatta, manovinnanam anatta, manosamphasso anatta, vedana anatta, tanha anatta.
mn148:16.1: Ayam kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkayasamudayagamini patipada—
mn148:16.2: cakkhum ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.1: rupe ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.2: cakkhuvinnanam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.3: cakkhusamphassam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.4: vedanam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.5: tanham ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.6: sotam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.7: ghanam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.8: jivham ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.9: kayam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.10: manam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati, dhamme ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati, manovinnanam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati, manosamphassam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati, vedanam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati, tanham ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:22.1: Ayam kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkayanirodhagamini patipada—
mn148:22.2: cakkhum ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.1: Rupe ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.2: Cakkhuvinnanam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.3: Cakkhusamphassam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.4: Vedanam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.5: Tanham ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.6: Sotam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:23-27.7: ghanam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:23-27.8: jivham ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:23-27.9: kayam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:23-27.10: manam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.11: Dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.12: Manovinnanam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.13: Manosamphassam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.14: Vedanam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.15: Tanham ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
mn148:28.1: Cakkhunca, bhikkhave, paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va.
mn148:28.2: So sukhaya vedanaya phuttho samano abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
mn148:28.4: Dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano socati kilamati paridevati urattalim kandati sammoham apajjati.
mn148:28.6: Adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya phuttho samano tassa vedanaya samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
mn148:28.8: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhaya vedanaya raganusayam appahaya dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayam appativinodetva adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayam asamuhanitva avijjam appahaya vijjam anuppadetva dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn148:29-33.1: Sotanca, bhikkhave, paticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavinnanam …pe…
mn148:29-33.2: ghananca, bhikkhave, paticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghanavinnanam …pe…
mn148:29-33.3: jivhanca, bhikkhave, paticca rase ca uppajjati jivhavinnanam …pe…
mn148:29-33.4: kayanca, bhikkhave, paticca photthabbe ca uppajjati kayavinnanam …pe…
mn148:29-33.5: mananca, bhikkhave, paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va.
mn148:29-33.6: So sukhaya vedanaya phuttho samano abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
mn148:29-33.8: Dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano socati kilamati paridevati urattalim kandati sammoham apajjati.
mn148:29-33.10: Adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya phuttho samano tassa vedanaya samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
mn148:29-33.12: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhaya vedanaya raganusayam appahaya dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayam appativinodetva adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayam asamuhanitva avijjam appahaya vijjam anuppadetva dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn148:34.1: Cakkhunca, bhikkhave, paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va.
mn148:34.2: So sukhaya vedanaya phuttho samano nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
mn148:34.4: Dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattalim kandati na sammoham apajjati.
mn148:34.6: Adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya phuttho samano tassa vedanaya samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
mn148:34.8: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhaya vedanaya raganusayam pahaya dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayam pativinodetva adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayam samuhanitva avijjam pahaya vijjam uppadetva dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatiti—thanametam vijjati.
mn148:35.1: Sotanca, bhikkhave, paticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavinnanam …pe….
mn148:36.1: Ghananca, bhikkhave, paticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghanavinnanam …pe….
mn148:37.1: Jivhanca, bhikkhave, paticca rase ca uppajjati jivhavinnanam …pe….
mn148:38.1: Kayanca, bhikkhave, paticca photthabbe ca uppajjati kayavinnanam …pe….
mn148:39.1: “Mananca, bhikkhave, paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va.
mn148:39.2: So sukhaya vedanaya phuttho samano nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
mn148:39.4: Dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattalim kandati na sammoham apajjati.
mn148:39.6: Adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya phuttho samano tassa vedanaya samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
mn148:39.8: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhaya vedanaya raganusayam pahaya dukkhaya vedanaya patighanusayam pativinodetva adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya avijjanusayam samuhanitva avijjam pahaya vijjam uppadetva dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatiti—thanametam vijjati.
mn148:40.1: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmim nibbindati, rupesu nibbindati, cakkhuvinnane nibbindati, cakkhusamphasse nibbindati, vedanaya nibbindati, tanhaya nibbindati.
mn148:41.5: manasmim nibbindati, dhammesu nibbindati, manovinnane nibbindati, manosamphasse nibbindati, vedanaya nibbindati, tanhaya nibbindati.
mn148:41.6: Nibbindam virajjati, viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
mn148:41.7: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
mn148:41.9: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
mn148:41.10: Imasmim kho pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane satthimattanam bhikkhunam anupadaya asavehi cittani vimuccimsuti.
